headline: Nucor Announces 212th Consecutive Cash Dividend and New Share Repurchase Program
summary: The Board of Directors of Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) declared the regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.56 per share on Nucor's common stock. This cash dividend is payable on May 11, 2026 to stockholders of record on March 31, 2026 and is Nucor's 212th consecutive quarterly cash dividend.

headline: Nucor Announces Promotion of Jack Sullivan to Chief Financial Officer, Treasurer and Executive Vice President
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) announced today that John L. "Jack" Sullivan, Vice President, Treasurer and General Manager of Investor Relations, will be promoted to Chief Financial Officer, Treasurer and Executive Vice President effective March 1, 2026. He will succeed Steve Laxton, who was promoted to President and Chief Operating Officer effective January 1, 2026.

headline: Nucor Corp. (NYSE:NUE) Passes Key Dividend Sustainability Screen
summary: Nucor Corp. (NUE) offers a reliable dividend with a sustainable payout, strong profitability, and solid financial health for income-focused investors.

headline: U.S. trading partners cheer Supreme Court tariff ruling — but businesses must still navigate 'murky waters'
summary: The U.S. Supreme Court voted 6-3 to strike down large parts of President Trump's tariff policies Friday.

raw.headline: U.S. trading partners cheer Supreme Court tariff ruling — but businesses must still navigate 'murky waters'
raw.summary: The U.S. Supreme Court voted 6-3 to strike down large parts of President Trump's tariff policies Friday.

headline: What Supreme Court ruling against Trump tariffs means for your money
summary: The Supreme Court ruled against a centerpiece of President Donald Trump's tariff agenda on Friday. Consumers could save money as a result, economists said.
